tech_news.title: I wore Google's upcoming Android XR smart glasses, and it's a future I'd actually want to live in - ZDNET
tech_news.description: From multimodal AI glasses to immersive headsets, Google's Android XR vision is more ambitious - yet clearer - than ever.

tech_news.title: We Think We Know What Geoff Keighley's Weird Desert Statue Is Teasing - IGN
tech_news.description: The mystery of the weird desert statue may have been solved in advance of The Game Awards on Thursday, as some newly registered trademarks reveal a game and a logo from a familiar franchise that looks essentially identical to a symbol on the monolith.

tech_news.title: Nothing’s community-designed Phone 3A adds some color and matching dice - The Verge
tech_news.description: Nothing’s Phone 3A Community Edition features a teal-tinted 90s-themed design and a matching dice set.

tech_news.title: Microsoft rounds off 2025 with one final Windows 11 feature update — here's what's new and fixed - Windows Central
tech_news.description: The Windows 11 December 2025 Security Update is now rolling out, and alongside it comes a number of new features and changes to round off the year.

tech_news.title: Microsoft December 2025 Patch Tuesday fixes 3 zero-days, 57 flaws - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: Microsoft's December 2025 Patch Tuesday fixes 57 flaws, including one actively exploited and two publicly disclosed zero-day vulnerabilities.

tech_news.title: Google Photos launches new video editing tools - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Google Photos' new update helps make editing video reels in the app quicker, such as new templates that already add music and text to clips.

tech_news.title: Pixel Watch December 2025 update rolling out with Wear OS 6.1 - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: Following the announcement this morning, Google is rolling out the December 2025 update to the Pixel Watch 4, 3, and 2.

tech_news.title: Google rolling out Notification Organizer to Pixel - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: Following AI Summaries last month, Google is rolling out the Notification Organizer to Pixel phones with Android 16 QPR2.

tech_news.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle update adds an outfit suitable to eat chilled monkey brains in - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: The team at MachineGames has issued a new update for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle.

tech_news.description: Track your playtime, Trophies, and more
